1.png.description: The pile of 3 gray stones is visible on the left side of the image. Moving left will bring the drone closer to the target and help center it in the frame.

2.png.description: The pile of 3 gray stones is visible on the low table against the wall. Moving straight will bring the drone closer to the target while keeping it centered in the frame.

3.png.description: The pile of 3 gray stones is visible on the left side of the image. Moving left will help center the object in the frame.

4.png.description: The pile of 3 gray stones is visible on the left side of the image. Moving straight will bring the drone closer to the target while keeping it centered.

5.png.description: The pile of 3 gray stones is visible on the left side of the bench. Moving straight will bring the drone closer to the target while keeping it in view.

6.png.description: The pile of 3 gray stones is clearly visible on the left side of the image. Moving straight will bring the drone closer to the target while keeping it centered.

7.png.description: The pile of 3 gray stones is partially visible on the left side of the image. Moving left will help center the object in the frame.

8.png.description: The pile of 3 gray stones is visible and centered in the image. Moving straight will bring the drone closer to the target.

9.png.description: The pile of gray stones is partially visible at the bottom of the image. Moving down will help center the object in the frame.

10.png.description: The pile of 3 gray stones is clearly visible and centered in the image. Moving straight will bring the drone closer to the target.

11.png.description: The pile of 3 gray stones is clearly visible, takes up a significant portion of the image, and appears extremely close with clear texture and detail. No further movement is necessary.
